channel.title: CVE Feed for WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway -- WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway -- WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-39308|2024-09-16T20:58:23.507Z -- woocommerce%20myghpay%20payment%20gateway -- woocommerce%20myghpay%20payment%20gateway
item.description: The WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway WordPess plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the clientref parameter found in the ~/processresponse.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 3.0.
